sources.title: Heaven And Earth
sources.description: In 16th century Japan, two samurai engage in massive battles across the countryside; one attempting to conquer and the other attempting to defend his land while repressing his love for a woman after taking a vow of celibacy.

metadata.Plot: Warlords Kagetora and Takeda each wish to prevent the other from gaining hegemony in feudal Japan. The two samurai leaders pursue one another across the countryside, engaging in massive battles of cavalry and infantry. Younger and less brutal, Kagetora must find the strength to be as brutal as his opponent, but at what cost?
metadata.Writer: Haruki Kadokawa, Chôgorô Kaionji, Toshio Kamata
metadata.Actors: Takaaki Enoki, Masahiko Tsugawa, Atsuko Asano
